content: According to Accordance's website, they offer multiple tutorials on how to use the search command line in their software. These tutorials can be found on their website or accessed directly through the Accordance software itself. They also offer webinars and video tutorials that cover search features in detail, including the use of the search command line. Additionally, users can consult the searchable Knowledge Base or reach out to the Accordance customer support team for help with any search-related questions or issues.
